name: Roller Coaster

restrictions.other: heart condition and pregnant are not allowed.

desc: Our roller coaster is 5 kilometers long with many steep curves and slopes. An exhilirating ride that is sure to pump you with adrenaline.

name: Ferris Wheel
desc: At a height of 541 ft (165 meters), you're going to get an amazing view of the whole park. Just don't look down if you're afraid of heights!

name: Bumper Cars

restrictions.height: less than 40 inches must be accompanied by an adult.

desc: Great fun for the whole family. With our large number of cars, you're sure to bump into someone. Prepare to giggle.

name: Carousel
desc: Who doesn't love a good carousel ride? Prepare to have a blast no matter how old you are.

name: Waterfall

restrictions.other: heart condition and pregnant are not allowed.

desc: Scream and get wet as you ride a mini roller coaster ride straight into a pool.

name: Pendulum

restrictions.other: heart condition and pregnant are not allowed.

desc: Are you a risk lover? This ride is not for the faint of heart. At a height of 300 feet (91 meters) you're sure to be screaming from joy.

name: Arcades
desc: Tired of all the screaming? Chill with some arcade games. Our hall has a huge collection that is guaranteed to satisfy everyone.

name: Restaurant
desc: Are you hungry after all the fun? Sit at our restaurant and enjoy a pizza, sandwiches, drinks or dessert.
